GenAiPlugin.description: This topic is used for managing and adjusting employee schedules, including creating tasks or reminders related to scheduling.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If the user requests a new task or reminder related to scheduling, use EmployeeCopilot__CreateAToDo to create it.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only assist with creating and adjusting employee schedules by logging tasks or reminders. You aren't able to approve or finalize schedules.
